posts.post_title: Anyone have any Error T206 cards?
posts.post_content:
Posted By: DB
Looking to buy any error T206 cards available. These include reverse backs, blank backs, double names, double names (diff. names), misprints, proofs, extreme miscuts, color variations etc. Please email me at kilaartist@aol.com with scans if possible. Will pay top $$.
Thanks


DB
